issue.title: New netflix tracker

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Latest

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Netflix.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

logs.netflix.com appears in my dns logs. Can be blocked safely.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Blocking this URL makes my Netflix randomly start loading while watching shows. @zloyden

issue.title: link.adtidy.org

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://link.adtidy.org/forward.html?app=browser_extension&action=report&from=popup&product_type=Ext&product_version=4.4.22&url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2F&system_version=Windows+11&browser=Chrome&filters=7.101&stealth_enabled=true&browsing_security_enabled=false](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flink.adtidy.org%2Fforward.html%3Fapp%3Dbrowser_extension%26action%3Dreport%26from%3Dpopup%26product_type%3DExt%26product_version%3D4.4.22%26url%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252F%26system_version%3DWindows%2B11%26browser%3DChrome%26filters%3D7.101%26stealth_enabled%3Dtrue%26browsing_security_enabled%3Dfalse) ### Comment > Looking at the redirect destination from the AdGuard extension's "Report an issue" feature: > `https://reports.adguard.com/ja/new_issue.html?browser=Chrome&browsing_security.enabled=false&clid=skKZas&filters=7.101&product_type=Ext&product_version=4.4.22&stealth.enabled=true&system_version=Windows+11&url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2F&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=popup&utm_source=browser_extension > ` > We can see that there's a string `&clid=skKZas`. > Could this be a tracking parameter? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fjlxv6mb1l448w80o0kog4w40o4gw8klzz2jw22j4g.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.22 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection options: | Strip URLs from tracking parameters Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://j-basketball.club/bbs/chibajets/past_log.php?date=2023-10-09](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fj-basketball.club%2Fbbs%2Fchibajets%2Fpast_log.php%3Fdate%3D2023-10-09) ### Comment > These are advertisement banners for their sister websites. > The first images are the ads that can be seen at the URLs reported. > The second images are ads that can be seen on different pages of the same website. The links are provided below. > ``` > https://j-basketball.club/bbs/chibajets/past_log.php > ``` > > I also found similar ads on other websites. > The third and subsequent screenshots are from those other websites. > ``` > https://bm.best-hit.tv/japan/?page=13 > https://bm.best-hit.tv/we/past_log.php > ``` > > > I have also saved the website as HTML and uploaded it to cloud storage. The file names should match the image numbers. Please take a look. > ``` > https://send.internxt.com/download/2fffc5b4-6051-4ed9-8530-a3bba627d56b?code=03e34f630d277dee2550447018aed208244b3528513a0bc898d3f94784c4a16f > ``` > > > Before checking the ads, I updated the rules and waited 5 minutes. I also cleared the Safari cache. > I'm using an iPhone 14, so I don't think it's a performance issue. And I don't have any other apps running besides AdGuard and Safari, so I don't believe memory is a problem either. > > Thank you. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2derbf3p6zmsowkswk44o40kk4cc0og9vrrcs7bs74.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jj7kxeslirwowk04w80so0ockoscsks4lque59yfes.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2qx1vils2zk0swowkg4ccokgcg0scosg5nww1z72xk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 4 ![Screenshot 4](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1s8t249q4kn48408oo4wkcco8840csk130ws037vdj.png?nc=1)
